divs: Sighting DetailsNotice object hovering when I look out from my deck. I started to use the video on my cell phone. Then I told my girlfriend to grab our digital camera for a better picture. I think it could be something from our military .I have never seen anything like this before .
Summary: Flash different color lights, hovered, begin to move when i started taking pictures,
